dc:title: On Pilgrimage - May 1967
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Praises the changes in the liturgy of the Mass--"I do love the guitar masses." Paraphrases a talk she heard on the price of peace. Frustrated with the new postal requirement to use zip codes in mailing the paper.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 850 1967-05-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
